item.title: MS is doomed
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: Finally, people are figuring out what i said in '99 when I quit : hardware prices go down so software prices can't continue to increase, and Microsoft's marketshare is nearly 100%, so Microsoft's only future revenue graph is downward. If revenue goes down, stock price goes down, employees leave for more growth companies, Microsoft evaporates.
